Text: FLAC = Free Lossless Audio Codec. Apple Lossless in NOT the same thing as FLAC because it requires proprietary closed source software to playback or convert and therefore it is not FREE (as in Freedom).
Nobody said it was the same. Convertable though.
Yes, but when you try to upload ALAC under audio > music, it says invalid category and won't allow it to be posted. They're close enough imo.
